content: Now all of you good people remember to pay your taxes in April because there are twelve million illegal aliens that are depending on you and with our government borrowing money to give to the banks the government needs all of the money that it can get.
reply: Now all of you good people remember to pay your taxes in April because there are twelve million illegal aliens that are depending on you and with our government borrowing money to give to the banks the government needs all of the money that it can get.
title: taxes

content: I paid my taxes last month. $168.00 Federal and $695.00 to the state of NC, plus $274.00 to the man who did my tax forms for me. I am happy to pay them. Here in NC we have thousands and thousands of Mexicans, Blacks, and Poor White folks who have been on food stamps and welfare for generations. But that is ok because we don't really want them out in the work force taking good paying jobs away from the rich, the educated, the motivated, the Democrats, and the many other civil servants of our state and government.
